record.name: FibRgW97
record.description:
The FibRgW97 structure is a variable-length portion of the Fib.

Class and fields descriptions are quoted from Microsoft Office Word 97-2007 Binary File Format and [MS-DOC] - v20110608 Word (.doc) Binary File Format
record.author: Sergey Vladimirov; according to Microsoft Office Word 97-2007 Binary File Format Specification [*.doc] and [MS-DOC] - v20110608 Word (.doc) Binary File Format

field.name: wMagicCreated
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: wMagicRevised
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: wMagicCreatedPrivate
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: wMagicRevisedPrivate
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: pnFbpChpFirst_W6
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: pnChpFirst_W6
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: cpnBteChp_W6
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: pnFbpPapFirst_W6
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: pnPapFirst_W6
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: cpnBtePap_W6
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: pnFbpLvcFirst_W6
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: pnLvcFirst_W6
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: cpnBteLvc_W6
field.description: This value is undefined and MUST be ignored

field.name: lidFE
field.description: A LID whose meaning depends on the nFib value
